name: NomadicMatt
0:
”Alexa, Start Nomadic Matt”
”Play the latest blog post”
”Tell me about Matt”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nomadic matt
des:
What's New
 - Skill is now available in Australia, Canada, Great Britain, India, and the United States

About Nomadic Matt:

Over the past several years, I’ve helped millions of people answer questions and travel more with tested and proven tips and advice. I help you spend less time searching the Internet and being overwhelmed with information and more time doing the one thing you want to do: travel more. Along with this Alexa Skill, you can find out more about me and additional resources to help you travel anywhere better, cheaper, and longer at www.nomadicmatt.com

Try the following commands:

Engage the skill by saying:
 Alexa, Start Nomadic Matt

Once the skill is engaged, try the following commands:
 Play the latest blog post
 Play blog post 5
 Search for Budget
 Tell me about Matt
 Give me more information about the blog
 Help


**For information about this Alexa skill, visit www.MakeMeASkill.com or send an email to Support@MakeMeASkill.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
